meanings.definition: A person not currently holding a particular position or office.
meanings.sent1: During the election, the nonincumbents campaigned vigorously to win the office.
meanings.sent2: The nonincumbents are eager to bring fresh ideas and perspectives to the position.
meanings.sent3: The nonincumbents organized a bake sale to raise funds for their campaign.
meanings.sent4: In the world of chess, the nonincumbents are the pawns waiting to make their move.
meanings.sent5: The nonincumbents are like new seeds ready to grow into strong leaders.

meanings.definition: Those who are not currently in power or in a position of authority.
meanings.sent1: The nonincumbents are working hard to gain the support of the community.
meanings.sent2: In the upcoming election, the nonincumbents hope to bring about positive change.
meanings.sent3: The nonincumbents decided to host a talent show to showcase their skills.
meanings.sent4: The nonincumbents are like the underdogs fighting against the established leaders.
meanings.sent5: The nonincumbents are the rising stars challenging the status quo.
